original_text: So the Benjamites returned at that time and were given the women of Jabesh Gilead who had been spared. But there were not enough for all of them.
korean_text: 그 때에 베냐민이 돌아온지라 이에 이스라엘 사람이 야베스 길르앗 여자들 중에서 살려 둔 여자들을 그들에게 주었으나 아직도 부족하므로

sentences.original_text: So the Benjamites returned at that time
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 베냐민 지파 사람들이 그때 돌아왔고

sentences.original_text: and were given the women of Jabesh Gilead
But there were not enough for all of them
